items.sentence: I thought you might want to play a game of chess.
I thought you thought Tom was still a bricklayer.

Even with all his wealth and fame, he\'s unhappy.
Everybody knows Tom and I don\'t like each other.
I\'m not sure that anybody would want to do that.
I\'m positive Tom was the one who stole my watch.
Tom did a lot of stupid things when he was young.
I\'m supposed to meet Tom at 2:30 this afternoon.
I\'m sure Tom understands what we want him to do.
I\'m sure Tom will tell us if he needs something.
I\'m sure Tom would never do something like that.

Tom didn\'t even step out of the house yesterday.

Tom and Mary have been in Boston for three years.
